tests.name: start_prefer_mid
tests.description: After START, MID should be preferred (END is invalid)

tests.name: after_one_mid_valid_continuations
tests.description: After START MID, both END and MID should be likely

tests.name: after_three_mids_valid_continuations
tests.description: After 3 MIDs, both END and MID should be likely

tests.name: no_double_start
tests.description: After START, MID should be preferred over another START
